Header.title: Nhap Nho
Header.description: You are obssessed with searching for a dating place? You have to maintain a clunky Google Drive to save images of your dates? Nhap Nho is here to help you create the memorable dating moments

Services.name: Pidoco prototype
Services.text: This version includes 3 main features, namely (1) Dating place recommender, (2) Dating tour recommender, and (3) Making reviews.

Services.name: Paper prototype
Services.text: The prototype includes 5 features, i.e. (1) Newsfeed; (2) Dating place recommender; (3) Dating tour recommender; (4) Couple account and (5) Settings.

Services.name: First hi-fi prototype on Figma
Services.text: This version embeds comprehensive functionality of the app. It follows the visual guidelines and the design in Mockup. However, the design is not realistic and detailed enough. The interaction and flow of some tasks are not complete as well.

Services.name: Second Figma prototype
Services.text: The version implemented full functionality of the app. The design follows the visual guidelines closely. Compared to the prior version, it is more detailed with the appearance of scrollable function, realistic icon use and photo display. However, there remain some minor issues in terms of icon choice, words and the mismatched interaction.

Services.name: Current Figma prototype
Services.text: All of the significant issues arising in the Heuristic evaluation and Cognitive Walkthrough process are fixed. The design looks like the real app with (1) detailed design regarding elements, spacing and graphics, (2) real world content, and (3) highly realistics interaction.

Features.title: Record memories
Features.text: Create a memory with photos, videos, and personal reflection for a past date of your couple

Features.title: Throw back your journey
Features.text: View dating memories through a timeline or through the location that you have visited

Features.title: Discover new dating places
Features.text: Places recommended based on your tastes and knowledge from many other Daters.

Features.title: Joint account for you two
Features.text: Co-share, co-view and co-modify your dating journey without any difficulty of sharing content to multiple accounts
